includedAssets.title: Bringing Up Baby
includedAssets.synopsis: It's Jay's birthday and Gloria has a very big surprise for him.

includedAssets.title: Schooled
includedAssets.synopsis: Phil and Claire drop Haley off at college, and trouble brews at Lily's kindergarten. Bridesmaids favourite Wendi McLendon-Covey guest stars.

includedAssets.title: Snip
includedAssets.synopsis: Phil and Claire take steps to ensure their five-year plan stays on track, and Jay and Gloria butt heads over finding out the sex of the baby.

includedAssets.title: The Butler's Escape
includedAssets.synopsis: Gloria's pregnancy-induced snoring takes its toll on a sleep deprived Jay, and Cam becomes the new music teacher at Luke and Manny's school.

includedAssets.title: Open House Of Horrors
includedAssets.altTitle: S4, Ep5 - Open House Of Horrors
includedAssets.synopsis: While a none-too-pleased Claire is told to tone down her Halloween hijinks, Mitch and Cam must deal with a curious Lily.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: While a none-too-pleased Claire is told to tone down her Halloween hijinks, Mitch and Cam must deal with a curious Lily.

includedAssets.title: Yard Sale
includedAssets.synopsis: Old baggage of the literal and figurative variety resurfaces when the clan hold a yard sale, and Claire assesses Alex's new boyfriend.

includedAssets.title: Arrested
includedAssets.synopsis: Jay gets out of baby shopping, only to receive a surprise visit from ex-wife Dede (Shellie Long), and Phil and Claire need Mitch's help when Haley is arrested.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Jay gets out of baby shopping, only to receive a surprise visit from ex-wife Dede, and Phil and Claire need Mitch's help when Haley is arrested.

includedAssets.title: Mistery Date
includedAssets.synopsis: Phil misreads the signs when he makes a new friend, and Mitch and Cam have a surprise for Jay and Gloria. Guest starring Matthew Broderick.

includedAssets.title: When A Tree Falls
includedAssets.altTitle: S4, Ep9 - When A Tree Falls
includedAssets.synopsis: Mitch joins Cam in his efforts to save an old tree, while Claire and Gloria enjoy an eventful shopping trip. Funnyman Paul Scheer guests.

includedAssets.title: Diamond In The Rough
includedAssets.altTitle: S4, Ep10 - Diamond In The Rough
includedAssets.synopsis: Claire and Cam are bitten by the DIY bug after making over a rundown field, while Gloria decides to 'sing' to her bump.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Claire and Cam are bitten by the DIY bug after making over a rundown field, while Gloria decides to 'sing' to her bump.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Claire and Cam are bitten by the DIY bug after making over a rundown field, while Gloria decides to 'sing' to her bump.

includedAssets.title: New Year's Eve
includedAssets.synopsis: Jay is excited about seeing in the new year with his nearest and dearest at a hotel in Palm Springs, but Claire, Phil, Mitch and Cam have other ideas.

includedAssets.title: Party Crasher
includedAssets.synopsis: Gloria drops a big surprise on birthday boy Manny, while Clare is rankled by a denim outfitter (Jason Mantzoukas) with designs on Haley.

includedAssets.title: Fulgencio

includedAssets.altTitle: S4, Ep14 - A Slight At The Opera

includedAssets.title: Best Men
